title: Hart's Mesa
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Latin American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Latin food Mexican restaurant. Reported you will find 2 labeled vegan items on menu before 4pm. Other times you might get dairy in your dish. Ask for tofu scramble, tacos with field roast chorizo or seasoned tofu, or a torta with sweet potato. Mixed reports on whether rice and bean are vegan or not, so ask!
